title: Minecraft PE 0.7.0 [JK9Media]
description:
Minecraft PE 0.7.0

Name: Minecraft PE
Developer: Mojang
Version: 0.7.0 
Category: Arcade & Action
Price: 4,98 $
Rating: 9/10
From: Google Play
Contact: https://www.mojang.com/
Android: 2.3 and up
Root: No Root access needed
Tested on: 

*Model: GT-I9300 Samsung Galaxy S3

*Firmware: Jelly Bean 4.1.2 I9300XXEMC2

*Rating: Works good for me :) 9/10
******************************************************

What's New

What's in this version:
Version 0.7.0
- Alpha of Realms servers
- Buckets
- Fire
- Smooth lighting
- Spawn eggs
- Chat
- Egg, milk and cake
- Connecting players inventory is now saved on server
- New menus

******************************************************

Minecraft is about placing blocks to build things and going on adventures!
Pocket Edition includes randomly generated worlds, multiplayer over a local Wi-Fi network, and Survival and Creative modes. You can craft and create with your friends anywhere in the world so long as you have hands spare and battery to burn.

******************************************************
How to install:

1) Move the ''Minecraft PE 0.7.0.apk'' from the APK folder to your phone and be sure that you enabled: Allow app installs from 'unknown sources',

2) Install ''Minecraft PE 0.7.0.apkapk'',


3) Your done! Enjoy your application !
